comments:
With eclipse M7 + WST 1.0 M4.  Under J2EE perspective, expand "Other Projects"
in "Project Explorer" view and get this error.

WST and WTP 1.0M4 are only supported on Eclipse 3.1M6.  Future Integration
builds and the next milestone will be supported on Eclipse 3.1M7.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.

I encountered the same bug using Eclipse 3.1 release and WTP 0.7 Milestone. I
got it after I switched to J2EE perspective, and whenever I right-click an EJB
project, or navigate to an EJB jar indicated by a jar symbol, or navigate to
Session Beans, Entity Beans or MDB. With this unresolved, I cannot do any J2EE
work, therefore I hope the owner of this bug can change the priority to P1 (most
important).

be sure to check your "pre-reqs" are installed correctly (e.g. for EMF, GEF, and
JEM) as listed on download page. 

Since this bug was marked as 'invalid', no one will look at it, without 1) some
detailed steps to clearly reproduce (since many are doing what you are, without
the error), and 2) you re-opening the bug.

Also, double-check which version of Eclipse for which the WTP milestone build
you're using is built.  Only that *exact* version has been tested. 
NoSuchMethodErrors are clear indications of a version mismatch.

Thanks for help from all you guys. I have found out that I installed EMF Release
2.1.0 built on Jul 7, 2005, instead of the EMF Integration build on Jun 23,
2005, as prescribed on the WTP Milestone 5 download page.

Now that I have rebuilt my eclipse, it is now working fine. Thanks...
